Title: Crystals Have Power
Writer: Pendleton Ward (created by), Merriwether Williams (story by), Steve Little (story by), Patrick McHale (story by), Pendleton Ward (story by), Thurop Van Orman (story by), Cole Sanchez, Jesse Moynihan
Actors: Jeremy Shada, John DiMaggio, Polly Lou Livingston, Kent Osborne
Plot: Jake swears a life of non-violence right before a race of indestructible crystal-men abduct Finn to another dimension.
